content: thank you for checking out my crossing paths cowl this pattern contains both a cowl style and infinity scarf style the pattern is worked in joined unturned rounds it starts with a half_double_crochet textured edging and then moves to a center texture and ends with the same textured edging cowl dimensions 28 circumference 8 width/height infinity scarf dimensions 60 circumference 8 width/height the cowl uses about 230 yards of light worsted weight yarn the infinity scarf uses about 540 yards for the matching hat pattern please check out the crossing paths hat here on ravelry feel free to use the hashtags #tlccrossingpathscowl and #taralovescrochet on instagram so i can see your beautiful creations
